text:
I used to watch Kamen Rider when I was a kid! Although I don't remember a lot of the plot hahahahaha
It's always important to have other interests that are different to what you do, since it can always complement your work in other ways :smiley:

How do you feel about the different versions of consoles coming out? ps4 vs ps4 pro or xbox oneX? And most importantly Nintendo with their updated versions of handhelds (and now it seems the same for the Switch)?
The F1 and Cycling does give me a good outlook on design
I get why, but at the same time, it's not really helpful to consumers and developers having to making new tech.
